remarks: Eliminate ` ( F `` P ) =/= P ` from ~ cdlemg31c .  TODO:  Prove directly.  Todo: do we need to eliminate ` ( F `` P ) =/= P ` ?  It might be better to do this all at once at the end.  See also ~ cdlemg29 vs. ~ cdlemg28 .  (Contributed by NM, 29-May-2013.)
statement:
cdlemg12.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdlemg12.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cdlemg12.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
cdlemg12.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdlemg12.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdlemg12.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
cdlemg12b.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
cdlemg31.n $e |- N = ( ( P .\/ v ) ./\ ( Q .\/ ( R ` F ) ) ) $.
cdlemg31d $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) /\ ( Q e. A /\ -. Q .<_ W ) /\ ( v e. A /\ v .<_ W ) ) /\ ( F e. T /\ v =/= ( R ` F ) /\ N e. A ) ) -> -. N .<_ W ) $.
